anip.mediancut
Class ListColorCuboid

java.lang.Object
  anip.mediancut.ColorCuboid
      anip.mediancut.ListColorCuboid

public class ListColorCuboid
extends ColorCuboid

Represents a subspace of an RGB color space. Used in creating an indexed palette by median cut method. This implementations handles colors as a list. Useful for images that contain very few colors (few hundreds at most).

Field Detail

allOccurrences

private java.util.ArrayList<ColorOccurrence> allOccurrences
A list of all color occurrences in the whole RGB space, meaning not just the occurrences of this cuboid. The field .cuboid in the class ColorOccurrence contains information on which cuboid every occurrence belongs to. This field is a reference to an ArrayList that is common between every ListColorCuboid.

ownOccurrences

private java.util.ArrayList<ColorOccurrence> ownOccurrences
A list of color occurrences of this cuboid.

Constructor Detail

ListColorCuboid

ListColorCuboid(java.util.ArrayList<ColorOccurrence> allOccurrences)
Constructs a new ColorCuboid. Initial size is (0, 0, 0) - (255, 255, 255).

Parameters:
allOccurrences - A list of all color occurrences in the whole RGB space.

ListColorCuboid

public ListColorCuboid(int minR,
                       int minG,
                       int minB,
                       int maxR,
                       int maxG,
                       int maxB,
                       java.util.ArrayList<ColorOccurrence> allOccurrences,
                       java.util.ArrayList<ColorOccurrence> ownOccurrences)
Constructs a new ListColorCuboid.

Parameters:
minR - smallest value of red contained by the cuboid.
minG - smallest value of green contained by the cuboid.
minB - smallest value of blue contained by the cuboid.
maxR - greatest value of red contained by the cuboid.
maxG - greatest value of green contained by the cuboid.
maxB - greatest value of blue contained by the cuboid.
allOccurrences - A list of all color occurrences in the whole RGB space.
ownOccurrences - A list of color occurrences of this cuboid.
Method Detail

minimize

public void minimize()
Minimizes the size of the cuboid so that the faces of the cuboid touch the outermost color occurrences in the RGB subspace contained by the cuboid.

Specified by:
minimize in class ColorCuboid

getMedian

public int getMedian(int axis)
Returns median of the points along the specified axis.

Specified by:
getMedian in class ColorCuboid
Parameters:
axis - 0 if R, 1 if G, 2 if B.
Returns:
median

split

public ListColorCuboid split(int axis,
                             int point)
Splits the cuboid at the plane towards the axis and at the specified point at that axis.

Specified by:
split in class ColorCuboid
Parameters:
axis - 0 if R, 1 if G, 2 if B.
point - where to split. Its value has to be between min and max points of the cuboid along the correspongind axis.
Returns:
the other half of splitted cuboid.

getColor

public void getColor(short[] palette,
                     int index)
Writes weighted average of colors contained by this cuboid into the specified palette.

Specified by:
getColor in class ColorCuboid
Parameters:
palette - RGB palette. Data in order RGB RGB RGB..
index - Index number of color, 0..255.

public ListColorCuboid newInstance()
